title: Analyze Transformer Oil Sample
description: An asset manager reviews the lab results from an oil sample taken from a large power transformer to assess its internal health.

tasks.description: Ingest the lab report data, including dissolved gas analysis (DGA), moisture content, and dielectric strength.
tasks.expected_outcome: System parses and structures the data from the lab report.

tasks.description: Compare the results to industry standards (e.g., IEEE C57.104) and the transformer's own historical trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that furan levels are rising, indicating paper insulation degradation.

tasks.description: Estimate the remaining useful life of the transformer based on the rate of degradation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an updated end-of-life estimate.

tasks.description: Recommend a change in maintenance strategy, such as more frequent oil sampling or planning for replacement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends increasing the sampling frequency to every 6 months.
